channel.title: Pilot on Omar Valdez | The Data Fixer
channel.description: Recent content in Pilot on Omar Valdez | The Data Fixer

item.title: Pilot
item.description: It is very important that data is accessible and reusable for society and industry. Nowadays, it is crucial that data have the capacity to be accessible and reusable not only for the workforce but also for normal users like someone using social media and trying to download their own information. Creating or generating, saving, ingesting, transforming, processing, and visualizing data is a task that requires time and effort. Additionally, maintaining security, executing administration, performing operations, detailing orchestration, preserving good software engineering practices, and defining data architecture strategy are extremely critical aspects for the data ecosystem.
